interesting_fact: Has 50 states and the world's largest economy.
Home to the Great Wall and giant pandas.
Second-most populous country with rich cultural and historical heritage.
Largest rainforest, Amazon, is located in this beautiful country.
World's largest country spanning two continents, Europe and Asia.
Famous for sushi, samurai, cherry blossoms, and advanced technology.
Known for beer, engineering, Oktoberfest, and the Autobahn highway.
Comprises England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland together.
Eiffel Tower, croissants, fashion, and rich artistic heritage.
Has more lakes than any other country on Earth.
Home to kangaroos, Great Barrier Reef, and vast deserts.
Hosts three capital cities and diverse wildlife reserves.
